name: CVE-2022-32592
description: In cpu dvfs, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07139405; Issue ID: ALPS07139405.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:linuxfoundation:yocto:3.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:linuxfoundation:yocto:3.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8765:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8768:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8786:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8788:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8789:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8321:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8385:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8185:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6855:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6879:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6895:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6983:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8518:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8666:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8675:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
